bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: SameDiff: output arrays are not being re-created when shapes change
bug.description:
I've already fixed this for DynamicCustomOp here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/5668>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/5668</denchmark-link>
However, this is also happeninng for TransformOp, and (as far as I can tell from the code) accumulations, index accumulations, etc. - i.e., everything extending BaseOp.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
